column8: 4代的兵种，相对于3代其实是各有特色的，确切的说有可取之处，而且飞基地争夺地盘这种事在局部战争中也的确更为理想，地图太小，武器相对太大，导致限制了武器数量，我知道种种尝试都是以失败告终，反而最后被星际争霸2拿去充分利用了，仅仅因为星际争霸2还在用以往的打法，如果4代允许两种模式并存，相信评分仅次于凯恩之怒，而现在看来就远远不行了。
column9: Compared with the third generation, the soldiers in the fourth generation actually have their own characteristics. To be precise, they have their merits, and flying to bases to fight for territory is indeed more ideal in local wars. The map is too small and the weapons are relatively large, which limits the number of weapons. I know that various attempts have ended in failure, but in the end they were fully utilized by StarCraft 2, simply because StarCraft 2 is still using the previous playing style. If the fourth generation allows two modes to coexist, I believe the score will be second only to Kane's Wrath, but now it seems far from enough.

column8:
就不说激活码还需要去EA那边去重新激活，做了十几次掷骰子的验证码，以及卡了无数次的注册账号失败。这款游戏从头至尾都没办法和3代相比。我自己是个做游戏美术的，对游戏的机甲设计还是略有要求，先不说游戏其他部分，光美术而言就糟糕透顶，唯一可以拿来说的可能只有当中的影片做的更好了，可能他们钱全放在真人演出上了吧。话题回到游戏的机甲和兵种设计部分，好端端的几个机械硬是塞了一大堆光条，整个兵种和一堆塑料玩具一样质感极差，三代的那种真实感完全没了，让人特别失望。NOD的兵种也是变成了神经病，硬是塞了一些哥特元素还是啥的，LOW的飞起，特别是某些空中单位，你确定不是小玩具么？？丑的简直可以。再说说UI部分也是土到飞起，特别是胜利和失败图标，这是哪儿门子五毛特效啊？？之前炫酷的3D旋转标志到底去哪里了？
游戏玩法部分也特别奇怪，变成了一个容易卡人口的刷兵游戏，一开始选择几种不同的基地多余的不行，从三代过来的表示完全一脸懵，基础运营和玩法完全变成了其他方向，玩起来特别变扭难受。

不想多说了，糟糕透顶！ 还是玩3代吧。。。。。
column9:
Not to mention the need to reactivate the activation code from EA, the dozens of dice rolls, and the countless failed registration attempts. This game, from start to finish, is incomparable to the original 3. As a game artist, I have some qualms about the mecha design. Putting aside the rest of the game, the art alone is abysmal. The only positive thing about it is the cinematics, perhaps because they put all their money into the live-action performances. Back to the mecha and unit design: a few decent mechs are crammed with a ton of light bars, making the units feel like a bunch of plastic toys, completely devoid of the realism of the original 3. It's incredibly disappointing. Nod's units have also gone completely mad, shoving in some gothic elements or something. They're incredibly cheesy, especially the air units. Are you sure they're not toys? They're downright ugly. And the UI is incredibly tacky, especially the victory and defeat icons. What kind of 50-cent special effects are these? Where did the cool 3D rotating logo go?

The gameplay is also incredibly strange. It's become a farming game with a high population limit. The initial selection of several different bases is completely redundant. Coming from the third game, it's completely confusing. The basic operations and gameplay have completely changed, making it incredibly awkward and uncomfortable.

I don't want to say more. It's terrible! I'll just stick with the third game...

column8:
Я поставил игре лайк только за историю. Однако минусов в игре много:
1. Строительство - то что я любил в этой серии - его нет. Я разочаровался в ЕА именно тогда, 10 лет назад.
2. Графика 3 части в разы лучше, чем в 4й. словно создателей сменили, расстреляли, обoccали и изнacиловали. Именно в таком порядке. А на их место поставили людей, которые занимались разработкой мобильных игр.
3. Система баланса - ненужная чушь. Раньше ты строил базу и мог балансировано распределять игру под свою тактику. а сейчас ты просто выбираешь одну из трех систем танка, и воюй всю игру. Благо сменить можно во время игры, но удручает перестройка.
4. Концовку оставили открытой, но я просто не представляю какую наркоманию можно приплести к сюжету. Для меня игра кончилась на третьей части.
5. Каждый раз, чтобы войти в игру, надо вводить логин и пароль к серверам ЕА. Это неправильно как по мне. Игра забывает меня каждый чертов раз.
column9:
I liked the game solely for the story. However, there are many downsides:
1. Construction—what I loved in this series—is gone. I became disillusioned with EA right then, 10 years ago.
2. The graphics in Part 3 are vastly better than in Part 4. It's as if the creators were replaced, shot, pissed on, and raped. In that order. And in their place, they installed people who developed mobile games.
3. The balance system is unnecessary nonsense. Previously, you built a base and could balance the game according to your tactics, but now you just choose one of three tank systems and fight the entire game. Fortunately, you can change them during the game, but the restructuring is depressing.
4. They left the ending open, but I simply can't imagine what kind of drug addiction could be woven into the plot. For me, the game ended with Part 3.
5. Every time I want to log in to the game, I have to enter my username and password for the EA servers. This is just not right for me. The game forgets me every damn time.

УФФ,сложно говорить про снс4 но начнем мы с 2 вещей.
1)Как в это играть?
Да проблема большая у комьюнити просто запустить игру.Инструкция.
Покупаем игру-при первом запуске или ручками копируем ключ активации-заходим в свой аккаунт ориджина(ну или создаем новый если у вас нет)-добавляем на аккаунт игру-вставляем ключ-привязываем снс4 к акку ориджина-закрываем ориджин-запускаем снс4 через стим-вводим логин и пароль в лаунчере-создаем профиль нового игрока для снс4-заходим в игру-вводим логин и пароль еще раз-все можно играть без геммора и с ЖИВЫМ онлином.
2)Зачем? А потому что в 2020 с ртс на столько все хуе. что снс4 хорошая ртс.Да игра долбанный паралелепипед вопросов но.
-Играть то интересно
-Есть кооп кампания
-Живой на 2020 онлайн.
-Кампания интересна как в старые добрые времена с живыми актерами,сюжетными поворотами и тд и тп.
-Игра отказалась от стандартной механики снс-тоесть база с ресурсами и прочим.Чем взорвала не хило так жопу фанатам. БЛИАДЬ А ГДЕ ТИБЕРИУМ? где харвестеры?как тут какать?.Да соглашусь в корне менять механики для номерной части это плохо.НО .но,с новой механикой играть то интересно,игра то дарит новый опыт отличаемый от классического я строю электростанцию,я выхожу в казармы я строю ресурсник и параллельно пару солдат.Типичный дебют в ртс(стандартные действия для каждой партии) убираются сразу тут можно с розгона в карьер.Игра стала более динамичной не дающее игрокам сидеть в обороне.Интересная механика с профилями армии.Атака-Защита-Поддержка.Это все не обычно но интересно.Но это сыграло с игрой злую шутку,большинство комьюнити бомбануло,не разобралось и похоронило игру а вместе с ней и серию.Класс.
-Но кроме спорных моментов игра себе сама выстрелила пару раз в ногу.
1)Фракции,их всего две.В стратегии в 2010.Да разрабы после 2003 поняли что ртс на 2 фракции гивно и начали пилить на 3.Даже в 2 и 3 сс были забытые и скрины.А тут что?НОД ГДИ-нейтральная постройка с 3 типами юнитов забытых.ВСЕ.А где 3 фракция?Нельзя было сделать тех же скриннов или забытых сделать полноценной игровой фракцией?Или кого то новых?Например людей которых заипла грызня между гсб и нод и они создали свою фракцию под названием-как меня это все надоело пойду вломаю по роже всем кто воюет (я образно).А тут 2 фракции.Да юнитов много но 2 фракции?Але?В стар варс емпаир эт вор в аддоне 3 было.
2)Открытие юнитов за опыт.Ну тут гениально,я покупаю ртс а получаю открытие юнитов (способностей) как в ММО.Аху,я в шоке.Как бы ЕА ты кто такой *собака женского рода* чтоб это дело? Какого *полового органа* я должен юниты открывать в пвп\пве и кампании? У вас диллер есть .... Вы юниты в киосках покупаете?Вы во что играете? Вы что мудилы?Да при помощи не совсем честных методов можно открыть все юниты для всех 2 фракций часа за 4.НО ЗАЧЕМ? Я понимаю там выбивать достижения или шкурки...НО ЮНИТЫ В ПЛАТНОй ИГРЕ?????
Вердикт такой-дайте игре шанс,если вы раньше не смотрели самое время изза дефицита жанра ртс посмотреть на игру.
Это как стремная баба и бутылка водки,после бутылки водки стремная баба не такая уж стремная.А у нас 2020 и жан ртс.
В 2020 СнС 4 не такая уж плохая игра.
column9:
Phew, it's hard to talk about SNS4, but we'll start with two things.
1) How to play?
Yes, the community has a big problem with just launching the game. Here's the instruction.
Buy the game, copy the activation key the first time you launch it, or copy it manually. Log in to your Origin account (or create a new one if you don't have one). Add the game to your account. Insert the key. Link SNS4 to your Origin account. Close Origin. Launch SNS4 through Steam. Enter your username and password in the launcher. Create a new SNS4 player profile. Log in to the game. Enter your username and password again. You can play without any hassle and with LIVE online.
2) Why? Because RTS is so fucked up in 2020 that SNS4 is a good RTS. Yeah, the game is a fucking mess, but there are no questions. - It's fun to play.
- There's a co-op campaign.
- It's live for 2020 online.
- The campaign is as interesting as the good old days, with live actors, plot twists, and so on.
- The game has abandoned the standard SNS mechanics—that is, a base with resources and such. Which has really blew fans' minds. WHERE'S THE FUCK IS TIBERIUM? Where are the harvesters? How can I even say shit here? Yes, I agree that completely changing the mechanics for the numbered unit is bad. BUT, the new mechanics are interesting to play, and the game offers a new experience different from the classic one: I build a power plant, I go to the barracks, I build a resource tank, and at the same time, I build a couple of soldiers. The typical RTS opening (standard actions for each game) is immediately removed; here you can go from strength to strength. The game has become more dynamic, preventing players from sitting on the defensive. Interesting mechanics with army profiles: Attack-Defense-Support. It's all unusual, but interesting. But this played a cruel joke on the game; most of the community got mad, didn't understand it, and buried the game and, along with it, the series. Cool.
- But besides the controversial issues, the game shot itself in the foot a couple of times. 1) Factions, there are only two. In the strategy game in 2010. Yes, after 2003, the developers realized that RTS with 2 factions was crap and started making it 3. Even in SS 2 and 3, there were forgotten units and screenshots. And what's here? NOD GDI is a neutral building with 3 types of forgotten units. THAT'S IT. Where's the 3rd faction? Couldn't they have made the same screenshots or made the forgotten ones a full-fledged playable faction? Or someone new? For example, people who got fed up with the squabble between GSB and NOD and created their own faction called "I'm so sick of this, I'm going to punch everyone who fights" (figuratively speaking). And here there are 2 factions. Yes, there are a lot of units, but 2 factions? Hello? In Star Wars, there was an Empire vs. Thief expansion pack, 3. 2) Unlocking units with experience. This is brilliant! I buy RTS and get unlocked units (abilities) like in an MMO. Aha, I'm shocked. EA, who the hell are you, a *female dog*, to even think of this? What *genital organ* am I supposed to unlock units in PvP/PvE and the campaign with? Do you have a dealer? Do you buy units from kiosks? What are you playing? Are you idiots? Yes, using less-than-honest methods, you can unlock all units for all two factions in about 4 hours. BUT WHY? I understand earning achievements or skins... BUT UNITS IN A PAID GAME?????
The verdict is: give the game a chance. If you haven't tried it before, it's high time you gave it a try due to the shortage of RTS games. It's like a creepy woman and a bottle of vodka. After the bottle of vodka, the creepy woman isn't so creepy. And we're in 2020 and RTS.
In 2020, SnS 4 isn't such a bad game.

column8:
第一次是在16年GDI和Nod都打到了20级，如果不是找一下当时的回忆和这一次降价我是不会再花钱买的。以下是我的理由：
1.相较RA，将军和其他泰伯，游戏模式变化太大了，人口限制这一改动在我看来直接杀死这游戏，而且建筑，技能，部队分开来搞，本意吧，我猜是加强团队合作，降低操作难度，可实际上战斗节奏太快，5V5一打团人都找不到了。
2.游戏模式太单一，玩起来太累，还要升级解锁单位，20级前对面AI压你等级，肝死。
3.剧情这。。。太草率了
但不得不说，这个游戏在渲染，模型和BGM方面做的很良心（Nod的战斗音乐上头）
哎。。。CNC系列就这么烂尾说实话真的难受，期待将来RA2和CNC2重做（将军有生之年能见到重做吧）
column9:
The first time I played it was in 2016, when both GDI and Nod reached level 20. If it weren't for the memories and this recent price drop, I wouldn't have bought it again. Here are my reasons:
1. Compared to RA, General, and other Tiber games, the game mode has changed dramatically. The population limit change, in my opinion, killed the game. Furthermore, the buildings, skills, and troops are now separate. I guess the original intention was to enhance teamwork and reduce the operational difficulty, but in reality, the battles are too fast-paced. In a 5v5 group fight, you can't find anyone.
2. The game mode is too monotonous and tiring to play. You have to level up and unlock units, and before level 20, the opposing AI outclasses you. It's a bit of a grind.
3. The story is... too sloppy.
But I have to say, this game's rendering, models, and background music are very well done (I'm addicted to Nod's battle music).
Alas... It's really sad that the C&C series ended so badly. I look forward to the future remakes of RA2 and C&C2 (I hope General will see them in his lifetime).

column8:
"Command & Conquer 4: Tiberian Twilight" is the worst C and C game I have ever played, because:
1) It has a mobile base that you have to keep moving.
2) You have to collect resources by driving a unit to the resource area and back again - but that function isn't automated (which is annoying).
3) The creation of units is limited.
4) You have to earn upgrade points to make your units stronger, but those points take too long to earn.
When I played, I found that the first lot of units are weak and junk.

You also have to defend points, manually collect resources, and keep these points under your control, and you have to choose defence (which gives you defensive structures and low level assault units) or a sky base (no defence, but flying units, low grade tanks and vehicles) or an "Assault" base (which has good tanks, but no sky units or defensive structures.

The only positive I can give is that the controls are not bad (although not great), and it is a nice looking game with good graphics.

column8:
Мне очень сильно хотелось, чтобы это была настоящая часть серии, а не левый суррогат, который в последний момент решили немного подкрасить и попытаться выдать за чистую монету. Я несколько раз начинал в нее играть, и даже почти прошел. Я надеялся разглядеть в ней хоть какую-то ценность, подвергая сомнению всю критику. И у меня не получилось. Единственное, что в этой игре бесспорно круто – это главное меню. Я залипал в него каждый раз, когда запускал игру. Оно излучает обещания пафоса и эпичности, и когда ты видишь его в первый раз, то не повестись невозможно. Кажется, что вот оно – невероятное и долгожданное приключение в любимой вселенной. Но хуй там плавал, к сожалению.

Иронично, что большинство критики таки оказалось вкусовщиной. Однако в каждом случае я все равно приходил к выводу, что игра говно. Например, все говорят, что персонажи плохие и никто не запоминается, кроме Кейна, и что актерская игра плохая и сюжет тупой. Это только отчасти правда. Я не знаю, куда люди смотрели, но актерская игра в роликах очень хорошая. Они стараются, и это ясно видно. А вот сами роли – плохие.

Или, например, фанаты серии ругают мультяшность графики, хотя в ней нет вообще ничего плохого. Я бы даже сказал, что она крутая. И эффекты сделаны очень красиво. А вот дизайны юнитов – это пиздец. Большую часть игры на экране какие-то коробки либо на колесах, либо летающие, которые с первого взгляда очень непросто отличить друг от друга. При этом некоторые отдельные юниты выглядят очень классно. Например, мотоциклы, стелс танки и шагоходы. Но все это теряется на фоне заполоняющих коробов, особенно у ГДИ.

И сам геймплей тоже обругали, главным образом за то, что нельзя строить базу. По-моему, эта игра вышла слишком рано, а разработчики, в свою очередь, опередили время. И практически предсказали тренд компьютерных игр на десятилетие вперед. Но ни аудитория не была готова, ни сами разработчики не были готовы сделать это правильно. Мне кажется, что если бы она выходила сегодня, то с некоторыми поправками такая моба-стратегия могла бы и выстрелить. Я был бы более чем не против поиграть в такую игру сейчас, если бы ее сделали с прицелом на конкурента доты, лольца и прочих овервотчей.

P.S. Финальный ролик – ебаный пиздец. Просто ебаный стыд. Очень дешево и всрато одновременно.
column9:
I really wanted this to be a true installment in the series, not a last-minute imitation that they'd tweaked and tried to pass off as genuine. I tried to play it several times, and even almost finished it. I hoped to find some value in it, questioning all the criticism. And I failed. The only thing undeniably cool about this game is the main menu. I was glued to it every time I launched it. It exudes a promise of pathos and epicness, and when you see it for the first time, it's impossible not to fall for it. It seems like this is it—an incredible and long-awaited adventure in a beloved universe. But unfortunately, it was a complete failure.

It's ironic that most of the criticism turned out to be a matter of taste. However, in each case, I still came to the conclusion that the game is crap. For example, everyone says the characters are bad and no one is memorable except Kane, and that the acting is bad and the plot is dumb. This is only partially true. I don't know what people were looking at, but the acting in the cutscenes is very good. They're trying hard, and it's clearly visible. But the performances themselves are bad.

Or, for example, fans of the series criticize the cartoonish graphics, although there's nothing wrong with them at all. I'd even say they're cool. And the effects are very beautifully done. But the unit designs are a disaster. Most of the game shows boxes on screen, either on wheels or flying, which are very difficult to distinguish from each other at first glance. That said, some individual units look really cool, like motorcycles, stealth tanks, and walkers. But all of this gets lost in the background of the overflowing boxes, especially in GDI.

And the gameplay itself has also been criticized, mainly for the inability to build a base. In my opinion, this game came out too early, and the developers, in turn, were ahead of their time. They practically predicted the trend in computer games for a decade to come. But neither the audience was ready, nor the developers themselves were ready to do it right. I think if it were released today, such a MOBA strategy game could have been a success with a few tweaks. I'd be more than willing to play such a game now if it were made with an eye toward competing with Dota, LoL, and other Overwatch games.

P.S. The final trailer is fucking awful. It's just fucking disgraceful. It's cheap and completely fucked up at the same time.

column8: Von allen C&C Spielen defintiv das schwächste. Haarsträubend abschreckender Login-Prozess, die Gegner KI ist ein Witz, die eigene KI auch (ein Baum ist ein undurchdringbares Hindernis) und das schlimmste ist das neue System mit "Kommandopunkten" statt Tiberium-Abbau. Ich mein - C&C war Tiberium-Abbau und daraus Basen bauen. Aber dieses System ist wirklich völlig freudlos. Dafür gibt's extraviele extraschlimme Real-Video-Sequenzen mit Kane, der leider immer noch nicht schauspielern kann. Die coolen Nicht-Real-Videos haben sie dafür fast komplett weggelassen. Was für ein Schrottspiel.
column9: Definitely the weakest of all the C&C games. The login process is incredibly daunting, the enemy AI is a joke, as is the AI ​​itself (a tree is an impenetrable obstacle), and the worst part is the new system with "command points" instead of Tiberium mining. I mean, C&C was about mining Tiberium and building bases with it. But this system is truly joyless. Instead, there are extra-terrible live-action video sequences with Kane, who unfortunately still can't act. They've almost completely omitted the cool non-live-action videos. What a crap game.

column8:
I played this with a friend ages ago for the campaign and brief multiplayer match; am an avid fan of C&C having grew up with it.

It's not the worst C&C game to date, or even when it came out sadly as EA are clueless idiots; any and all lite or mobile versions are blatantly worse if by a small degree.

They removed the core gameplay in favour of an untested premise that proved largely inferior and alienated the fans and vets (the only people who would play) and gave a pretty lacklustre rushed story.

Lots of the game feels out of balance and overhauled units and other things unnecessarily. C&C 3 did exist and had gotten very close to a great system, yet they threw out all of that to try something completely different?

I'd say this was the game that killed the franchise but in truth, EA's meddling and incompetence killed the franchise.
It's quite worth playing the older titles, though I wouldn't be surprised to find very little for online play left.

column8: As someone who grew up playing the many variations of this beautiful game franchise from the originals, red alert; generals; and the Tiberium sagas; even years after i purchased this horrid abomination of a game I still cannot bring myself to play it. This crap is not how the game series should have been sent off, this crap should never have seen its first downloads and unfortunate purchases. The developers I would hope didn't think this would be received well and did this under the age old my way or the highway petty bullshit that plagues the world of creativity when money is involved at any realistic level. If you've found yourself intrigued by this series, if you have any love for what you have come to enjoy out of this amazing strategy series DO NOT by this garbage please I wanted it to do well when it released I wanted to believe I was wrong for this thought process, but if over 2k people have had the same thoughts as i have that this game should be pulled erased and forgotten and our money and time reimbursed because of its sheer garbage nature then i can live with my favorite series ending in a damned dumpster fire so long as someone else can be spared my irritation. Edit: EA removed this dumpster fire and made it harder to get to hide the shame of this garbage game. F U C K. E A.

Ho comprato questo gioco nonostante gli avvertimenti di coloro che ci hanno giocato, pensavo "Eh voglio provarlo con i miei occhi, vediamo se é davvero così brutto come dicono"...
...sono stato avvertito. 
Hai solo 50 punti comando, che anche se sembrano tanti in realtà ti permettono di avere sì e no 8 unità. Il gameplay é a dir poco noioso e... ci sta un sistema di level up dell'account per sbloccare tutto ciò che puoi costruire in una partita, nonostante nella campagna single player arrivi a combattere i mech di tier 3 nonostante stai ancora con i soldatini di livello 1. column9:
I bought this game despite the warnings of those who played it. I thought, "Hey, I'll try it for myself, see if it's really as bad as they say."
...I was warned.
You only have 50 command points, which, while they may seem like a lot, actually only allow you to have about 8 units. The gameplay is boring to say the least, and... there's an account leveling system to unlock everything you can build in a game, even though in the single-player campaign you can fight tier 3 mechs while still using tier 1 soldiers. Highly not recommended.

column8:
I loved C&C 3, both games.  But C&C4 went in the complete wrong direction.  The game mechanics are overly complex and just not fun and the online emphasis is a drawback, not an enhancement.  They got everything right in C&C3.  In fact, I would still be willing to pay money for an authorized C&C3 DLC with a full blown GDI or Scrin campaign, similar to what they did with Kane's Wrath.  Use the same game mechanics but clean up the engine and graphics.

For anyone who loves C&C3, stay far, far away from C&C4.

column8: sad

怎么说呢，从小玩CNC系列玩到大，2018年入的正，一直玩到现在。音乐绝对好评，代入感很强，一听打起来就十分带劲。剧情的话其实还算好，烂尾就烂尾吧。游戏模式方面有点MOBA游戏的内味了，以前和朋友玩的时候甚至还要严格分工什么的【笑】。虽说人口限制确实是一个硬伤，但是呢你如果能凭借少得可怜的人口数去征服战场，那也不失为一种独特的乐趣。这个游戏里面多人合作远远比单人游戏拥有的快乐更多，想一想各种坑队友什么的，就算是被骂也觉得没什么。毕竟在团队合作里面才会体会到真正的友情。升级什么的慢慢来就可以了。这种5V5的竞技模式真的很让人着迷，天天想着不同的打法不同的阵容。最希望的是哪一天可以自由组队【不受阵营限制的自由组队】就好了。总而言之，这款别具风格的RTS游戏，很有潜力。具体怎么发展还是要看EA了，总之，这款游戏我给绝对好评。
column9: Well, I've been playing the CNC series since I was a kid. I bought it in 2018 and have been playing ever since. The music is absolutely amazing; it's incredibly immersive, and the action is incredibly exciting the moment you hear it. The storyline is actually pretty good, though the ending might be lame. The gameplay has a bit of a MOBA vibe. When I played with friends, we even had to strictly divide up the roles and stuff [laughs]. While the population limit is definitely a drawback, conquering the battlefield with a meager population is a uniquely enjoyable experience. The multiplayer aspect of this game is far more enjoyable than playing alone. Think about all the times I've let down my teammates, and even getting scolded isn't a big deal. After all, true friendships are forged in teamwork. You can just take your time leveling up. The 5v5 competitive mode is truly addictive, and I'm constantly trying to figure out different playstyles and lineups. I'd love to see the free teaming experience someday, regardless of faction restrictions. All in all, this unique RTS game has a lot of potential. How it develops specifically still depends on EA. In short, I give this game an absolute thumbs up.

column8:
I'm not sure what almost ruined this more for me; the wave of negative reviews by angry 30 year old teenagers taking out their frustration on software after their partners / parents crapped on them for peeing on the toilet seat and not cleaning up afterwords or leaving dirty laundry on the floor? Or perhaps the C&C fanboy/girl base who expected Tiberium Wars 3.5 but got something different, so threw the toys out of the cot? I'd say the former, who appear to be in the majority, as the latter have the intelligence to channel their anger and hatred towards the big bad nasty evil multinational conglomerate cabal - EA for short. Fair game to them, their opinion is almost relevant, but still...

For perspective: after coming back to Tiberium Wars and Kane's Wrath time and time again (it's aged beautifully, hasn't it?), I finally decided to try this out as I wanted a bit more story, however I was fully aware of the negative reviews over the years. Finally I got my chance as I had just finished it's predecessor for like the 5th time when this one appeared on special for literally pennies, so I thought "why not?"

I found myself fighting the feeling that the lynch mob were right, at least during the first few missions. But once I had numbed myself to the fact that the story was indeed passable, the acting (or overacting, in some cases) was lacklustre (excluding Joe Kucan, of course) I went with it and in the end found myself playing the game for what it was. And it was actually okay.

The formula is completely different and forces you to be more resourceful. Resource harvesting is gone and bases are essentially mobile. The graphics, lighting etc, remind me of Tiberium Wars, thus feel familiar which is okay. Units are over the top, but some structures remind me of it's predecessor. 

In a nutshell - I'm kind of glad I played/finished this game and got to scratch it off my list. At no point did I feel the need to rush through and each night I couldn't wait to continue playing.

Did I get my money's worth? Definitely
Did EA ruin the franchise by trying to reinvent the wheel? 110% Yes
Would i have preferred "Tiberium Wars 3.5" instead of this? Absolutely
Was it a memorable experience? Not entirely
Was it as bad as people say? Definitely not

If you can pick it up for couple of £ one day and are curious, I'd recommend it. You wouldn't have lost much. Sadly, some of the keyboard warrior reviewers here have turned this game (among others) into a public toilet where they can dump their hatred and anger, wash their hands and move on to Dota 2, CS:GO and Fortnite (games with communities that aren't toxic at all ;P). 

Whatever. Just be sure to pick through the intelligent, logical reviews before deciding. My verdict? It's not THAT bad.

column9:
You manage to log in to EA, but then the key doesn't work. I got to thinking, so I went to Origin to find it and entered the key Steam had given me, and VOILÀ! It's downloaded. xD

Even so, the game is bad. It's about running around the map with your base on your back, playing cat and dog with the enemy who's doing the same thing as you. You don't create bases, there's no resource gathering, units are made at the base with legs, and there's a very small limit to how many you have. Total nonsense. Anyway.

column8:
É bem zuado kkk!
Valor: Só em promoção
Gráficos: Bacaninha, mas nada espetacular
Bugs: Vai bem até, nada preocupante
Unidades: Tem umas bacanas, como aviões de cura bem grandes, mas nada incrível
Jogabilidade: Mudou muito da série:
- Agora temos 3 tipos de bases, e elas definem o tipo de unidade que podemos construir, e não tem tanto aquele conceito mais de cravar no chão e defender
- As unidades parecem carro de palhaço, nunca para de sair mais da base. Tem lá um cap que limita o total, mas não tem aquela restrição de quanto melhor minera recursos melhor teu exército... ficou bem mais superficial.
Progressão: isso ficou bom pelo menos, vai ganhando experiência e assim mais algumas unidades novas, mas não tem uma árvore para escolher, é meio tosco, linear mesmo.

Final: Se é fã da série, siga a série pq esse tá bem fora do esperado.
column9:
It's pretty messed up, lol!
Price: Only on sale
Graphics: Nice, but nothing spectacular
Bugs: Okay, nothing to worry about
Units: There are some cool ones, like very large healing planes, but nothing amazing
Gameplay: It's changed a lot from the series:
- We now have three types of bases, and they define the type of unit we can build, and it's not as much about sticking it in the ground and defending.
- The units look like clown cars, they never stop leaving the base. There's a cap that limits the total, but there's no restriction that the better you mine resources, the better your army... it's much more superficial.
Progression: This is good at least; you gain experience and thus some new units, but there's no tree to choose from; it's kind of clunky and linear.

Final: If you're a fan of the series, follow the series because this one is way outside of what you expected.

column8:
想来想去还是给了差评。
说实话这是CNC系列游戏体验最差的一款了，EA的创新不仅没有给CNC带来新生反而给CNC的棺材钉上了最后一颗钉子。
说这款一无是处的话是十分不公平的。单位设计与模型很棒；进攻、防御、支援的设计也还可以；如果抛去及其垃圾的剧情和CNC续作的滤镜来看的话至少是一款勉强及格的游戏。以上就是所有我能挑出来的优点了。
至于该游戏的缺点，包括但不限于过少的人口，体验极差的遭遇战，不知道是谁脑袋一热想出来的升级解锁单位，这都给这个游戏带来了极差的游戏体验，再加上食屎级的剧情，造就了CNC历史上最差的作品。
及其不推荐购买，即使是抱着试一试的心态也不要买，你会后悔的
column9:
After much deliberation, I've decided to give it a negative review.

To be honest, this is the worst CNC game in the series. EA's innovations haven't given CNC a new lease on life, but have instead hammered the final nail in its coffin.

To say this game is completely worthless is completely unfair. The unit designs and models are excellent; the attack, defense, and support systems are also passable; if you look past the abysmal plot and the CNC sequel lens, it's at least a passable game. Those are all the positives I can find.

As for the game's shortcomings, they include but are not limited to the small population, the abysmal skirmish experience, and the seemingly impulsive idea of ​​leveling up to unlock units. These all contribute to a dreadful gaming experience. Add to that the abysmal plot, and this makes this the worst CNC game in history.

I highly recommend not buying this game, even if you're just trying it out. You'll regret it.

column8:
I actually like the concept of this game. They made a big mistake putting "4" in the title because you assume it will be like 1-3 but it's not. I did actually enjoy the game play though. 

Back when you could play online my biggest problem honestly was the you didn't get to pick which faction to play half the time because it had to have equal numbers of GDI and Nod players. Don't know why it matters. In every other C&C game you could skirmish with whatever teams you want. 

Not played for years but based on the other reviews you can't even play online now so for that reason I'm going to to choose not recommended.

column8: This game is such a massive piece of shit, they took literally everything that was the heart and soul of CNC and turned it into some shitty rock, paper, scissors game. there is so much game design that just doesnt make any sense, whether its the 3 distinct "mobile bases" for each faction, that can only build a third of your unit roster. or maybe the units cards that "level up" the more you use them, leading to an extremely unbalanced multiplayer, or the nonsensical storyline.... everything about this game just feels like a cash grab, it feels rushed, it feels like the development team had so many ideas and orders pulling them in different directions that the end product suffered so badly its absolutely unplayable.

A mediocre game that takes an approach completely at odds with all other games in the C&C franchise. If this wasn't branded with "Command & Conquer" you'd have no idea that it was meant to be part of the series at all, due to the fall in quality, the completely different gameplay style and the lack of an enjoyable experience.

Save your money for a real C&C game.

column8:
Минусы: 1. Сюжет слабый, особенно концовка (да, их там несколько, но по факту, одна и та же). Персонажи убогие. Даже Кейна подпортили, как по мне. Хотя Джо Кукан всё еще играет отлично. Никогда не забуду Кейна предыдущих частей. 2. Игра не стоит своих денег. Я за Red Alert 3 готов отдать 999 рублей, а вот за такую короткую, да и можно сказать, сделанную на коленке игру, 1к это перебор. 3. Мертвый мультиплеер (то-ли из-за серверов, то-ли из-за мертвого онлайна, хз). 4. Обесценивание юнитов и построек. Раньше, вы ценили юниты и постройки из-за того, что вы на них тратили большое количество денег. Это очень сказывалось на динамике игры в положительную сторону. Сейчас же это убрали. Вам вообще будет наплевать на юнитов. Потеряли - сделали новых. Это полностью уничтожает разнообразие и динамику. Зачем это сделали? Непонятно. (5). Перевод. Перевод убогий. Например: кому, наxеp, пришла в голову идея о переименовании ГСБ в ГДИ?????. Для тех, кто не в теме, поясню: GDI это Global Defense Initiative, что можно перевести как Глобальный Совет Безопасности. А ГДИ это что? Я даже предполагать не буду. Озвучка посредственная, видно что вообще не старались.  Просто позвали самых заезженных актеров на озвучку, которые просто читают текст. Только Кейн и Жена ГГ озвучены нормально. 6. Защита от взлома. Наличие DRM, постоянное подключение к интернету и необходимость иметь аккаунт EA. (7). Музыка. Не знаю почему, но мне вообще не зашло. Какие-то звездные войны, а не C&C.
() - субъективный или относящийся к определенной версии игры

Плюсы:
Их нет, к сожалению
column9:
Cons: 1. The plot is weak, especially the ending (yes, there are several, but essentially, they're the same). The characters are pathetic. Even Kane was ruined, in my opinion. Although Joe Kukan still plays great. I'll never forget Kane from the previous games. 2. The game isn't worth the money. I'm ready to pay 999 rubles for Red Alert 3, but for such a short, and one might even say, hastily made game, 1k is too much. 3. Dead multiplayer (either because of the servers or because of the dead online, I don't know). 4. Devaluation of units and buildings. Previously, you valued units and buildings because you spent a lot of money on them. This greatly impacted the dynamics of the game in a positive way. Now they removed this. You won't care about units at all. They lost them - they made new ones. This completely destroys the variety and dynamism. Why did they do this? It's unclear. (5). Translation. The translation is poor. For example: who the hell came up with the idea to rename GDI to GDI????? For those who don't know, GDI stands for Global Defense Initiative, which can be translated as Global Security Council. And what is GDI? I won't even guess. The voice acting is mediocre; it's clear they didn't try at all. They simply hired the most overused voice actors who simply read the text. Only Kane and the main character's wife are voiced properly. 6. Hacking protection. DRM, constant internet connection, and the need for an EA account. (7). Music. I don't know why, but I didn't like it at all. It feels like Star Wars, not C&C.
() - subjective or specific to a specific version of the game

Pros:
There aren't any, unfortunately.

column8: fps değeri çok düşük.

和 三 代 完 全 不 一 样 
人口上限和画风软化我都能接受，隔壁星际一样有人口上限，人家依然有很好的体验；红警3画风比这个更Q，但我也表示很喜欢。结果EA直接度改成成了英雄连4，RTS 的基础结构直接给整没了，EASB这么NB你咋不去收购水雷？
差劲的寻路和碰撞体积还是没改，一个小兵穿过队伍，其他单位直接抱头鼠窜，同年出的星际2和这个形成了鲜明对比。
剧情突然神秘，开始朝着无脑洗白nod去了，三带留下来的谜团吗没几个解开的。
ps根据大佬说这个四代就是EA赶鸭子上架，把外传作品命令与征服：竞技场包装成了续作卖，所以好好地RTS直接成了王八大战，EASB完事
column9:
It's completely different from the third game.

I can accept the population cap and the softened graphics. StarCraft, next door, also has a population cap, and it still offers a great experience. Red Alert 3's graphics are even cuter than this, but I still like it. EA then went all-in with Company of Heroes 4, completely destroying the fundamental structure of the RTS. With EASB being so awesome, why didn't they buy mines?

The pathfinding and collision issues remain the same. A single creep walks through the group, and the rest of the team just runs away. This is in stark contrast to StarCraft 2, released the same year.

The plot suddenly became mysterious, and it's all about mindlessly whitewashing Nod. Few of the mysteries left behind by the third game have been solved.

PS: According to some experts, the fourth game was just EA rushing things out, packaging the spin-off Command & Conquer: Arena as a sequel. As a result, a solid RTS game has been reduced to a saga of idiots. EASB is done.

column8:
This wasn't just a case of trying something aggressive and risky and having it fail in flames. This was abject disregard and disrespect for the consumer base. 

The best thing I can say about this game is that when it came out we thought EA had hit a low point. We were so naive. The rabbit hole turned into an inter-dimensional wormhole. 

If you're considering paying money for this atrocity in some 2020 COVID-19 sale, chances are it's not your money.

I'll just find a video website to watch the CG and then delete the game.

column8:
Command and Conquer 4 was a bad game when it first came out and it's still a bad game after all these years.

A little backstory behind the game, this was going to be a standalone game set in its own universe that's completely separate from the Command and Conquer universe. Early on during the project, the brilliant executives at EA thought they would make more money from the game if they slapped the Command and Conquer logo on it and based it within the Tiberian universe. So the devs were pretty much forced to turn a game that was never intended to be a Command and Conquer game into Command and Conquer 4. 

The result? An absolute mess. Plays nothing like any of the Command and Conquer games. There's really no economy or base building, it's just mindless unit spamming until you win. I completed the GDI and Nod campaigns and then immediately uninstalled -- never to play again. The story is terrible, by the way.

Playing Command & Conquer 4 makes me wonder why they didn't make Command & Conquer 4. 
This is not a Command & Conquer game.
This is a capture the flag game with tanks.
Is it possible that the people who made this had even played the previous games?
If it weren't for GDI and Nod themed cutscenes, it would be completely unrecognizable.

column8:
Personally this has ruined the the franchise. Command and Conquer in name only. Personally its been some time since I played it. I lasted maybe the first 3 levels, quit game, without saving, then completely uninstalled it. Though unfortunately it still shows in my library and I regret it to this day for the money I threw away  for a game I waited so long for. And with the addition of an, apologies,   bullshit and totally unwanted/unnecessary mobile game, it seems to me CnC will turn into a pathetic money grab And as a fan for over 20 years, I'm not only disappointed but sickened by the pathetic attempt this game was to rekindle the franchise while totally ruining what could have been a fantastic addition. Alas, my fellow fans to the series. Perhaps in time, Kane shall rise again, and we get the Epic RPG we deserve with today's technology. Until then, 

ONE VISION, ONE PURPOSE. 
My brothers and sister.

column8:
This game is not ike the others. I grew up playing CNC, Starting with Generals and Zero Hour. eventually going back to play the 2D CNC Games. They all have the same basic way to play, Build a base, Defend and push. 

CNC 4 is more a Class Rush Strategy then a Real RTS. There is no base building. You drop the MCV build units from it and then send those units and the MCV to attack. thats it

Sure you can argue that you gotta finish the Kane Arch. No. watch someone else suffer through it or look up lore. cause playing it for the story is not worth it.

Go back, Play CNC 3 TB and KW. Heck even go play Generals or RA2 on ORIGIN. But do not BUY THIS GAME

column8:
首先，我是一个命令与征服老玩家（这系列游戏算是从小打到大了），要我用几个字表达我对这游戏的看法？只有一个字————呸。真如其名《命令与征服4:泰伯利亚的黄昏》我觉着可以把“4"和”泰伯利亚“去掉改成《命令与征服：黄昏》请各位C&C粉丝们别买这个游戏，就算一定为了信仰买，也要等促销时再去买。我承认这游戏BGM不错，但是游戏太TM烂了。
1.人口：众所周知，暴雪的星际和魔兽两大神作在当时是和红色警戒（命令与征服）在一个层面的，而让红色警戒别具一格的地方之一便是无人口限制，你想体验苏维埃的钢铁洪流？或者说是人民的力量？都没问题。EA把这个改没了我不懂是什么操作。
2.剧情：完全扯犊子，凯恩怎么就突然升天？NOD就没了！？剧情与前作什么鬼衔接啊。
3.游戏内：C&C3代的AI问题，寻路问题，依旧没有修复，许多BUG依然没修复。
原谅我爆了些粗口，如果非要我说这游戏有什么值得赞扬的地方？那也就只有BGM和CG值得称赞了吧。感谢EA仍然坚持制作真人CG。
column9:
First of all, I'm a longtime Command & Conquer player (I've been playing this series since I was a kid). How many words do I need to describe my opinion of this game? Just one: Ugh. The title, "Command & Conquer 4: Tiberian Twilight," really lives up to its name. I think they should just remove the "4" and "Tiberium" and just call it "Command & Conquer: Twilight." C&C fans, please don't buy this game. Even if you absolutely must buy it for religious reasons, wait until it's on sale. I admit the background music is good, but the game itself is utterly terrible.
1. Population: As we all know, Blizzard's two masterpieces, StarCraft and Warcraft, were on the same level as Red Alert (Command & Conquer) at the time. One of the things that made Red Alert unique was its unlimited population. Want to experience the Soviet surge of steel? Or perhaps the power of the people? No problem. EA removed this, and I don't understand their plan.
2. Plot: This is complete bullshit. How did Kane suddenly ascend to heaven? And NOD is gone!? What the hell is the connection between the plot and the previous game? 3. In-game: The AI ​​and pathfinding issues from C&C 3 remain unresolved, along with numerous other bugs.

Forgive the swearing, but if I had to praise this game, it would probably be the background music and CG. Kudos to EA for still sticking with live-action CG.

column9:
No wonder the negative reviews are overwhelming.

It lacks the C&C feel. The gameplay is different, of course, but it shouldn't look so cheap, okay?! Entering the menu feels like an indie game. Ken is so annoying. The other actors aren't good enough. The video looks like it was shot by an amateur YouTuber. The graphics are much worse than C&C3. Each unit has a colored circle. It's so ugly. The controls aren't as smooth as C&C3.

Many people say they can't enter serial numbers. After searching on Google, I realized I need to go to the EA account page to enter them properly. https://myaccount.ea.com/cp-ui/redemption/index

If it's so troublesome, why not just put the input method on the store page?

column8:
Безусловно, это худшая часть серии C&C. Даже Джозеф Кукан (он же Кейн) своей актерской игрой не смог вытащить этот геймплейно провальный кусок кода. Однако, в 2014 году, я купил диск с этой игрой в одном из магазинов. Целиком ее прошел. Несмотря на низкий рейтинг игры, я получил от нее какое-то удовольствие. Можно много говорить о том, что EA козлины, сделали всё возможное для слива игры, которая превратилась натурально в Halo Wars. Но даже этот слив, который с натяжкой можно назвать ПК RTS, остался у меня в душе приятными воспоминаниями.

Но EA не были бы EA если бы не накосячили даже с релизом в стиме. На стадии предзаказа игры, всем, сделавшим предзаказ, была доступна миссия НОД Night Moves, где под руководством Гидеона нужно было угнать три транспорта, а потом уничтожить краулеры ГДИ. Так вот. 2019 год, на момент покупки игры. Покупаю игру за свои деньги, а этой миссии НЕТ. Прошло 9 лет с релиза игры. ТАК КАКОГО ЧЕРТА НА ПИРАТСКОЙ БОЛВАНКЕ ЗА 150 РУБЛЕЙ ОНА БЫЛА, А В ЛИЦЕНЗИОННОЙ ВЕРСИИ УЖЕ СПУСТЯ 9 ЧЕРТОВЫХ ЛЕТ ВЫ НЕ ДАЛИ ДОСТУП К ЭТОЙ МИССИИ ВСЕМ???? КАКОГО ХРЕНА??? Это была одна из моих любимых миссий, плюс за нее давали максимум 4к опыта, что доп прокачка. А теперь ее тупо нет. Красавцы.
column9:
This is undoubtedly the worst game in the C&C series. Even Joseph Kukan (aka Kane) couldn't save this gameplay disaster with his acting. However, in 2014, I bought a copy of this game from a store. I finished it entirely. Despite the game's low rating, I did enjoy it to some extent. You can talk a lot about how EA are jerks, doing everything possible to dump the game, which naturally turned into Halo Wars. But even this dump, which can hardly be called a PC RTS, remains a fond memory for me.

But EA wouldn't be EA if they didn't screw up even the Steam release. When pre-ordering the game, everyone who pre-ordered had access to the NOD mission "Night Moves," where, under Gideon's leadership, they had to hijack three transports and then destroy GDI crawlers. So, that's the year 2019, when I purchased the game. I bought the game with my own money, and this mission is NOT there. It's been 9 years since the game's release. SO WHY THE HELL WAS IT ON A PIRATED FILM FOR 150 RUBLES, AND IN THE LICENSED VERSION, 9 FUCKING YEARS LATER, YOU HAVEN'T GAVE EVERYONE ACCESS TO THIS MISSION???? WHAT THE HELL??? This was one of my favorite missions, plus it gave a maximum of 4k experience, which was an additional leveling. And now it's simply gone. Beauties.

ต้องใช้รหัสจาก steam หลังจากโหลดเสร็จ เข้าครั้งแรกให้ก๊อปรหัสไว้

แล้วไปสมัครในเว็บ EA ลง KEY ตามนี้ ถ้าไม่เคยสมัคร ต้องสมัครสมาชิกใหม่ลงคีย์ให้เรียบร้อย (บางเครื่องลงคีย์จาก steam แล้ว error ให้ลงในเว็บไซต์แทน)
https://help.ea.com/en-us/help/origin/origin/origin-code-redemption-faq/#redeemcode

พอเสร็จแล้ว เข้า steam เปิดเกม ใช้ user pass ใน EA ที่สมัครไป เป็นอันจบ สามารถเล่นได้ แต่ยุ่งยากหน่อยสำหรับครั้งแรก
column9:
You can play.

You'll need a code from Steam after downloading. Copy the code when you log in for the first time.

Then, register on the EA website and download the key as follows. If you haven't registered before, you'll need to register a new account and download the key. (Some devices may experience an error when installing the key from Steam. Please download the code from the website instead.)
https://help.ea.com/en-us/help/origin/origin-code-redemption-faq/#redeemcode

Once you're done, log into Steam, launch the game, and use the user pass you registered with EA. You're done! You can play, but it's a bit tricky for the first time.

column8:
As a long-time C&C fan, this game almost made me angry. It's not fun. The single player is terrible. I just...I can't even.

All of the other games were fun. We all have different opinions on Red Alert 3, Tiberian Sun, and all the others, but they were all fun. Why couldn't this one end a good, traditional franchise with something that the fans would like?

I'm sad this is the end of the road for Command & Conquer. The story was better in my head back when I was 16.

column8: ok gia ta leyta tou

无法运行请看这里：
1.需要EA账号
2.需要在Origin激活（游戏内激活会报错）（就是那个“一般性错误”）
https://myaccount.ea.com/cp-ui/redemption/index
 完成后即可正常游玩，王八竞技场本质是像R6S一样的买断制网游
（不需要下载烂橘子）
老实说，王八竞技场没有想象的那么烂
[b]1.画面：7.5/10[/b]
不少人都在喷画面还不如CC3好，学RA3的卡通风格，确实如此，RA系一直是比较偏向“政治玩笑”“黑色幽默”性的游戏，使用卡通画风其实很多人都是可以接受的，但CC正传系从1代起构架的世界观一直都相对起来想向严谨一点的方向走，这么看起来确实别扭了一点。当然我觉得画面并不都全是缺点，这一代的模型更科幻一点，帅就完事了[strike]然而单位需要肝就很气[/strike]，其次至少CC4没有太过分的光污染（护盾亮度还能接受，要说的话就是火鹰空袭挺亮的，但是ra3换个黄色阵营色感觉整个人都要瞎了），而且单位细节也还可以，但也只是可以的程度（泰坦吃蓝核变猫耳还挺可爱的），个人觉得，总体还是差强人意，没有什么喷的那么过

[b]2.游戏性：5.5/10[/b]
要说他没劲，但是总会莫名其妙就玩上了，说他有劲的话，我还真找不出来哪好玩
怎么玩？很简单
你可以选择闹得或者鸡呆，选择自己的王八种类，分为走地王八（攻击&防御）和飞天王八（支援），而走地王八中还分为了四足王八和履带王八，你的最终目标是占领地图上的王八窝来夺取分数，当然也可以比较激进的去干翻敌人的王八，也可以
同时场上有时会有人投食萝卜，你可以让你的单位去争夺萝卜带回自己的王八沙滩，可以带来一定的升级点数来让自己的王八变得更♂强
正经点好了，先说这一代的较大改变：
1.GDI和Nod不再可以混编，如果你选择的阵营是GDI那么你的队伍必须全都是GDI。
2.不能偷鸡了，就是说双科技不再存在
3.所有的生产建筑集中于MCV上，不再单独建造
4.部分单位的改动，如斗牛犬从反装甲变成了反轻型单位，毒液从反步兵变成了反中型飞行器
5.老生常谈人口上限，并且没了经济，唯一的资源采集是偷泰矿升级（游戏中引导不好，采集泰矿之后运回自己颜色的网格状地形基地后方可获得点数）
主要还是这些，都说怕是说到明年，游戏上我也不能评判出来是不是有意思，首先游戏里杀伤力低的出奇（遭遇战可以改）尤其是镭射伤害打步兵特别感人，反制很死板，几乎就是个石头剪刀布，当然只娱乐也不是不能框框A，火炮伤害打轻中还行，重甲也能看（会有点小吃瘪）不考虑防空直接爆猎手和复仇者就行了，死板这算是第一个减分点吧
第二嘛，这个EA当初自己宣传的时候就说了，这一代拥有最多的玩具，前提是你够肝。遭遇战效率低，战役因为科技不全肯定会吃亏，如果单刷一关战役多多少少会破坏掉剧情体验，当然在线模式也能得到经验但是这游戏虽然有人玩但是匹配得到算我输
但是也不用特别担心，只要按剧情走拥有的军备是完全可以走完全流程的，不需要刻意刷满级，虽然这么说但是有单位不让用心里也挺恼火的
第三我不知道算不算缺点，我本来以为这一代没了采集建设应该会更简单，但是没想到其实是更难了 
首先因为这个死板的克制，队伍构成和单位配合变得尤为重要，其次需要占领多个目标，不玩多线操作是不行的
这也就代表了这个游戏的门槛，之前有RTS或RTT经验的人还好，但萌新会被百分之一万的劝退
开始玩着可能觉得还不错，但通关就腻了
啊对了顺便一说，本来是想抱着对开发者的最基本的敬意看完制作人员名单，没想到不止画面是重复的连名单都是tm循环播放

说第三点之前插几句，既然是CNC那怎么少的了批斗EASB的环节呢
本身这个游戏原名是 命令与征服：竞技场，一个网游性质的外传，但因为EA对EALA制作组的低效率感到不满，要求制作CNC正传恰烂钱，但时间完全不充裕（据说不足一年）开发是完全不可能的，于是将竞技场包装成了泰伯利亚黄昏
CC4中不少可以看的到赶工的痕迹，后面剧情方面也会稍微谈一些

但最大的错就在于你身为一个收官作明知自己只有死忠粉才会玩的情况下出了一个RTT游戏

P.S. 这作平衡并不好，加上死板的克制导致你即使全力了想带几个丢人ai也很难扳回局势，你拼了老命攻占来的节点赚到的那一点分可能还不如ai队友往对方老家送死了好几台猛犸带残骸丢的分多

3.剧情：5/10

以下情节包含剧透

终于到了最重要的环节了，CC正传的灵魂之一摆在这，也是王八竞技场的最大槽点，以下分析不喜勿喷
首先最大的吃书点是茄子咕咕咕了，说好的要来报复人类结果影子都没看见一个

尊王：地球的臭弟弟们爷来辣，吔我黄金舰队
茄子AI：正在链接服务器 地球 确认吗？
尊王：确认，搞快点
茄子AI：无法链接至EA服务器，请检查您的网线是否已拔出
尊王：QNMD，丝巾科技天下第一，搁这看不起谁呢
茄子AI：连接超时，正在返航
尊王：？？？？？

除此之外仍然有其他待解释的bug，比如全世界已不存在黄区蓝区，包括GDI总部莫名其妙都遭到了泰伯利亚的污染（zocom：摸了）而全世界剩下的唯一还能控制的污染区只有巴黎（我看今天谁敢乳法.jpg）但也产生了一些个人想法，希望各位可以积极指正或补充

1.GDI才是最大反派？CC4为nod洗白？
个人感觉没有这种说法
GDI的主观目的在于彻底净化这颗星球，而Nod的目的则是协助凯恩完成"升天"
最终的结局这么一看其实是双赢，只不过[b]GDI的胜利建立于Nod的胜利之上[/b]
洗白其实也说不上，CC里也并没有传统欧美爽片里的明确善恶观念，GDI不一定代表正义，Nod也不一定代表邪恶，但说真的我感觉王八竞技场的Nod结局才是正统结局

2.游戏中各个派系的关系？
游戏中大致有4个派系，[b]李奥斯领导的GDI理事会，詹姆斯旗下的GDI激进派，凯恩名下的Nod正统，还有隶属吉迪恩的Nod分裂主义[/b]，13和24为合作关系
倒是有个有意思的点，兄弟会每一代都不缺二五仔，算是传统艺能了。至于吉迪恩的叛变并一路阻碍凯恩的升天计划，官方似乎并没有解释，（在吃书漫画里面吉迪恩甚至都是凯恩一手安排的）
也不排除另一种可能，就是吉迪恩对凯恩的升天计划的改变感到不满
Nod最初信念是用泰伯利亚改造地球实现进化（通过命令与征服2可以了解最终可能将世界泰化，最后光头也升天便乘了光），但后来凯恩将自己升天的概念更换为"离开地球"。吉迪恩有可能是早期信念的拥护人，可能觉得我们辛辛苦苦打拼事业而光头却在想着跑路，才是真正的背叛者，把所有nod信徒摆了一道，自然有理由鼓动大量成员转而支持他的分裂主义并不遗余力的破坏升天计划

当然也有可能是EASB纯粹懒得编剧情直接吃书了

GDI方面詹姆斯的激进作为更偏向于公报私仇，因为她的两个孩子在第三次泰伯利亚战争中被思金人杀死，认为凯恩就是这一切的始作俑者（确实），同时凯恩与GDI的合作中仅仅与高层说明了自己的升天会彻底消除泰伯利亚，其余的官员都蒙在鼓里，詹姆斯认为凯恩开启传送门想把思金人引回地球引发新的战争，之前的事故早就给詹姆斯心底留下的恐惧阴影，这使她慢慢丧失理智，一切信念驱使她一心只想把凯恩从地球上彻底抹除

3.关于GDI第五关帮助主角越狱的人
这个也没有官方解释，神秘人杜凯特干员似乎在那一关之后就再也没出现过，那么他究竟是谁？目的是什么？
有一句不经意的话：有一个重要的人需要你离开
很明显了，他有极大可能是凯恩的信使，为什么？
除主角外的最后一位TCN植入者帕斯卡博士遭到杀害，但TCN的启动迫在眉睫，凯恩必须保证唯一可以操作TCN的主角的存活来完成自己的目的
同时在游戏开始时告诉主角"你需要支援，现在就要"然后就会有空降仓投下一只GDI步兵小队，而不是Nod的步兵，可见此人在GDI内部也拥有一定的权力（鸡呆：有内鬼，终止交易）
更多的资料似乎也不太好挖掘了，EASB也是真的绝，一个线性剧情的故事整的迷惑的不行还得东拼西凑自己推敲，当然也不排除是故意为了这样（cc4开发周期被大削，可能也是EALA为了减少工程量才这么做）
暂时先说这些 以后想起来再补的
总之cc4作为收尾作确实剧情缺少张力，上一代几乎是关系星球存亡的战斗到了这一代变成了小规模冲突，而且疯狂吃书，但毕竟官方最后一作也没办法不承认，但要说实在的，也算看的下去，虽然真的很让人失望
对了这一代剧情短的出奇，嗦不粗话
P.S. 虽然剧情涝但是其实还是被EA砍过，比如Nod线其实有自己的开头而不是继承GDI的分支等等
4.音乐：9/10
这一作的音乐非常棒，只能说配乐遇到一群猪队友带不动，不过不推荐各位玩之前去网易云等平台试听，一是平台收录几乎都不完整，二是cc4的音乐搭着游戏玩才有内味，只不过初次玩Nod你可能会有一种GLA的即视感，毕竟都是以女声吟唱为主+宗教感十足的风格，玩多了之后会感觉比鸡呆的还要有感觉

总之如果打总分的话，画面（10%）游戏性（50%）剧情（30%）音乐（10%）
（也不能说区别对待吧，隔壁RA3 本身就不是以剧情为主，所以剧情分占比较低，而cc正传这里剧情是灵魂呀，所以比重较高）
对于一路玩过来的cc粉丝来说，它就是这个最终得出来的5.9分了，但对于未接触过这个系列的人来说，其实真正的游戏体验比这个数字要高的多，玩起来感觉也还不错，不过也不能说粉丝挑剔，而是这个游戏配不上叫[b]4[/b]

附加：似乎cnc4很喜欢藏将军的小彩蛋，比如光影轰炸机的成就“米格战机”和帕拉丁的成就“十字军”
column9:
If you're having trouble getting it to work, please see here:
1. Requires an EA account.
2. Requires activation in Origin (activating in-game will result in an error) (this is the "General Error" error).
https://myaccount.ea.com/cp-ui/redemption/index
Once completed, you can play normally. Turtle Arena is essentially a buy-to-play online game like R6S.
(No need to download the rotten orange version.)
Honestly, Turtle Arena isn't as bad as you might think.
[b]1. Graphics: 7.5/10[/b]
Many people are complaining that the graphics aren't as good as CC3, imitating the cartoon style of R3. This is true. The R3 series has always leaned towards "political jokes" and "black humor," and many people are fine with the cartoon style. However, the worldview of the main CC series has always been relatively rigorous since the first generation, so this does look a bit awkward. Of course, I don't think the graphics are entirely flawed. This generation's models are a bit more sci-fi, and they look cool, which is fine. [strike] However, the units require a lot of grind, which is annoying. [/strike] Secondly, at least CC4 doesn't have excessive light pollution (the shield brightness is acceptable. The only thing I can say is that the Firehawk airstrike is quite bright, but the yellow faction color in RA3 is blinding). Unit detail is decent, but only just okay (the Titan's cat ears after consuming a blue core are quite cute). Personally, I think it's generally acceptable, and not as bad as some people criticize.

[b]2. Gameplay: 5.5/10[/b]
If I say it's boring, I always find myself playing it. If I say it's exciting, I really can't find what's fun about it.
How do I play? It's pretty simple.
You can choose to be either Noisy or Chitose, and then select your own turtle type, which is divided into ground turtles (attack & defense) and flying turtles (support). Ground turtles are further divided into four-legged turtles and tracked turtles. Your ultimate goal is to capture turtle nests on the map to gain points. Of course, you can also be more aggressive and overthrow enemy turtles.
At the same time, people will occasionally throw carrots on the field. You can have your units fight for the carrots and bring them back to your own turtle beach. This will earn you upgrade points to make your turtles stronger.

Now, let's get down to business. Let's talk about the major changes in this game:
1. GDI and Nod can no longer be mixed. If you choose GDI, your team must be all GDI. 2. No more stealing, meaning dual techs no longer exist.
3. All production buildings are now centralized around the MCV, no longer building them individually.
4. Some units have been changed, such as the Bulldog, which has gone from anti-armor to anti-light units, and the Venom, which has gone from anti-infantry to anti-medium aircraft.
5. As always, there's a population cap, and with no economy, the only way to collect resources is to steal Tiberium for upgrades (though if you're not very good at it, you'll earn points for collecting Tiberium and transporting it back to your own colored grid base).
That's all I'm saying. I'm afraid the game won't be released until next year. I can't really tell whether it's fun or not. First, the game's damage is incredibly low (you can tweak it in encounters). Laser damage against infantry is especially depressing, and counters are incredibly rigid, practically rock-paper-scissors. Of course, just for fun, that doesn't mean you can't just attack with ease. Artillery damage is decent against light and medium enemies, and decent against heavy armor (a bit underwhelming). Ignoring air defenses, just take out Hunters and Avengers. That rigidity is the first downside, I guess.

Second, EA advertised this game as having the most toys, but only if you're dedicated. Encounter combat is inefficient, and the campaign is definitely at a disadvantage due to the lack of comprehensive technology. Soloing the campaign will somewhat ruin the story experience. You can still gain experience in online mode, but even though this game is played, I lose if I get matched.

Don't worry too much, though. As long as you follow the storyline, you can complete the game with your existing armaments. You don't need to grind to the max. Having said that, it's still annoying to be denied access to units.

Third, I'm not sure if it's a drawback. I thought this game would be easier without gathering and building, but it's actually harder. First, due to this rigid counter-strategy, team composition and unit coordination become crucial. Second, capturing multiple objectives requires multitasking.

This also reflects the game's entry level. Those with RTS or RTT experience might be fine, but newbies will be completely put off.

You might find it enjoyable at first, but you'll tire of it once you've completed it.

Oh, by the way, I originally intended to read the credits out of basic respect for the developers, but not only were the screens repeated, but even the credits played on a loop.

Before I get to the third point, a few words: since it's CNC, how can I miss the EASB critique?

The original name of this game was Command & Conquer: Arena was an online game spin-off. EA, dissatisfied with the inefficiency of the EALA development team, demanded a sequel to Command & Conquer to cash in. However, with limited time (reportedly less than a year), development was impossible. So, Arena was packaged as Tiberian Twilight.

Civil Service IV shows numerous signs of rush work, and I'll discuss the story later.

But the biggest mistake was releasing a RTT game for the final game, knowing only die-hard fans would play it.

P.S. This game isn't well balanced, and the rigid control makes it difficult to turn the tide even if you try your best and bring in a few disgraceful AIs. The few points you earn from desperately capturing a node might be less than the points lost by your AI teammates sending several Mammoths to the enemy's base and carrying wreckage.

3. Plot: 5/10

The following plot contains spoilers.

Finally, we've reached the most important part. One of the spirits of the original CC is here, and it's also the biggest flaw in Turtle Arena. If you don't agree with the following analysis, please don't criticize.
First and foremost, the biggest disappointment is Eggplant's grumbling. He promised revenge on humanity, but there's not even a trace of him.

Zun Wang: Earth's stinking little brothers, here comes my Golden Fleet!
Eggplant AI: Connecting to server, Earth, are you sure?
Zun Wang: Confirmed, hurry up!
Eggplant AI: Unable to connect to EA servers. Please check if your network cable is unplugged.
Zun Wang: QNMD, Silk Scarf Technology is the best in the world. Who are you looking down on here?
Eggplant AI: Connection timed out. Returning to base.
Zun Wang: ??? ? ?

Besides that, there are still other bugs that need to be explained. For example, there are no longer any yellow or blue zones in the world, and even GDI headquarters has been inexplicably contaminated by Tiberium (Zocom: Touched). The only remaining controllable contaminated area in the world is Paris (let's see who dares to say that today.jpg). But I also have some personal thoughts, and I hope you can actively correct or supplement them.

1. Is GDI the ultimate villain? Does CC4 whitewash Nod?
Personally, I don't think so.
GDI's subjective goal is to completely cleanse the planet, while Nod's goal is to assist Kane in his "ascension."
The final outcome, from this perspective, is actually a win-win situation, but [b]GDI's victory is built on Nod's victory[/b]
It's not really a whitewash. CC doesn't have the clear-cut good and evil concepts of traditional European and American blockbusters. GDI doesn't necessarily represent good, and Nod doesn't necessarily represent evil. But honestly, I feel that the Nod ending in Turtle Arena is the canonical ending.

2. What are the relationships between the various factions in the game? There are roughly four factions in the game: the GDI Directorate led by Leos, the GDI Radicals under James, the Nod Orthodoxy under Kane, and the Nod Separatists under Gideon. Nod 13 and Nod 24 are in a cooperative relationship. An interesting point is that every generation of the Brotherhood has had its share of traitors; it's a tradition. As for Gideon's betrayal and subsequent obstruction of Kane's Ascension plan, there seems to be no official explanation (in the comics, Gideon is even orchestrated by Kane). It's also possible that Gideon was unhappy with Kane's change in his Ascension plan. Nod's original belief was to use Tiberium to transform the Earth for evolution (as seen in Command & Conquer 2, where the world could eventually be Tiberiumized, with the Bald Man ascending and riding the light). However, Kane later changed his concept of ascension to "leaving Earth." Gideon might be a proponent of the earlier beliefs, perhaps feeling that we've worked so hard to build our careers while Baldy is thinking of running away, making him the true traitor. He's playing a trick on all of Nod's followers, naturally motivating a large number of them to support his separatist ideology and sabotage the Ascension Project.

Of course, it's also possible that EASB simply couldn't be bothered to write a plot and simply went with the book.

On the GDI side, James's radical actions are more likely a personal vendetta. Her two children were killed by the Scrin during the Third Tiberium War, and she believes Cain is the culprit (which is true). Meanwhile, in his collaboration with GDI, Kane only explained to senior management that his ascension would completely eliminate Tiberium, leaving the rest of the officials in the dark. James believed Kane opened the portal to lure the Scrin back to Earth and spark a new war. The previous incident had already left a shadow of fear in James' heart, slowly driving her sanity. Her single-minded determination to completely wipe Kane off the face of the earth was driven by her convictions.

3. Regarding the person who helped the protagonist escape prison in GDI's fifth level: There's no official explanation for this. The mysterious Operator Duquette seems to have disappeared after that level. So who is he, and what is his purpose?

There's a casual remark: "There's someone important who needs you to leave." Clearly, he's most likely Kane's messenger. Why? Dr. Pascal, the last TCN implant recipient besides the protagonist, has been killed. However, the TCN's activation is imminent, and Kane must ensure the survival of the protagonist, the only one capable of operating the TCN, to achieve his goal. Also, at the start of the game, he tells the protagonist, "You need support, and you need it now," and a drop pod drops a GDI infantry squad, not Nod infantry, suggesting this person holds considerable power within GDI (Jidai: There's a mole, deal terminated). Further information seems difficult to uncover. EASB is truly incredible. A linear storyline is so confusing that you have to piece it all together. Of course, this isn't ruled out as intentional (CC4's development cycle was significantly shortened, perhaps EALA did this to reduce engineering workload). That's all for now. I'll add more to it later if I remember.

Anyway, CC4, as the final game, lacks plot tension. The battles that were almost planet-or-death in the previous game have become small-scale skirmishes in this one, and it's a complete overkill. But after all, it's the official final game, so you can't deny it. Honestly, it's still playable, though it's truly disappointing.

By the way, this game's plot is surprisingly short, and I'm not going to say anything bad.

P.S. While the plot is laggy, it's still likely EA's fault for cutting some corners. For example, the Nod arc actually has its own beginning, rather than being a sequel to GDI.
4. Music: 9/10
The music in this game is fantastic. I can only say that the soundtrack can't carry the team if you're dealing with a bunch of idiots. I don't recommend trying it on platforms like NetEase Cloud Music before playing. Firstly, the collections on those platforms are mostly incomplete, and secondly, CC4's music only really feels right when you play it with the game. However, your first time playing Nod, you might get a bit of a GLA vibe, with its predominantly female vocals and religious feel. After playing more, you'll find it even more engaging than DAMN.

In short, if I were to give it an overall score, it would be graphics (10%), gameplay (50%), story (30%), and music (10%).
(It's not like I'd discriminate against RA3. The story isn't primarily story-driven, so the plot score is relatively low. In the original CC, the story is the heart of the game, so it carries more weight.

For CC fans who've been playing all the way through, this is the final score of 5.9. However, for those new to the series, the actual gameplay experience is much higher than this number, and it feels quite good. It's not that fans are picky, but rather that this game doesn't deserve the name [b]4[/b]

Additional note: It seems CNC4 likes to hide little Easter eggs in generals, such as the Light and Shadow Bomber's "MiG Fighter" achievement and the Paladin's "Crusader" achievement.

1、作为rts，把基地分成不同形态可移动我还能忍，但是我的建筑们呢！我那一大堆的电厂矿场各种工厂呢？！没了！都没了！基地只能造点炮台！这他妈的是命令与征服？！你他妈叫命令与征服？！我从来没为一个游戏如此愤怒过！垃圾！纯粹的垃圾！别人都是去其糟粕取其精华，这款游戏是去其精华取其糟粕！

3、EA！你知道我从这款游戏里看到了什么吗？半成品！！！不对！是他妈的一粒渣滓！我能看出这款游戏赶工的如此严重！既然你认为rts已经不再赚钱了那麻烦做个人不要虐待这个史诗级的ip好吗！做手游做页游不更赚钱吗！非要强行出一款自砸招牌的游戏！你还记得你RA3里的合作模式吗？被SC2拿走并且大赚特赚你心情如何啊？你可真是大慈善家！

column9:
Do you know what the ultimate disappointment is? Do you know how disgusting it is for someone who's played and mastered most of the popular RTS games on the market?

Only flaws!

1. As an RTS, I can tolerate the base being divided into different movable forms, but what about my buildings! Where are all my power plants, mines, and factories?! Gone! All gone! The base can only build a few turrets! Is this Command & Conquer?! You call it Command & Conquer?! I've never been so angry about a game! It's garbage! Absolute garbage! Other games discard the dross and retain the essence, but this game discards the essence and retains the dross!
2. Unlocking units requires constant leveling?! WTF?! What's going on?! Can I just not play the campaign?! ​​What?! No skirmishes!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! Fuck you!!!!!!!
3. EA! You know what I see in this game? A half-finished product!!! No! It's a piece of fucking rubbish! I can tell this game was rushed! Since you think RTS games are no longer profitable, could you please be a human and stop mistreating this epic IP? Wouldn't mobile and web games be more profitable? Why force yourself to release a game that destroys your reputation! Do you remember the co-op mode in RA3? How do you feel about SC2 taking it away and making a killing? You're such a philanthropist!
4. No Chinese!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

column8:
Ne reprend quasiment aucune des mécaniques propres à un C&C, possède une limitation d'unités très basse pour cacher les défauts techniques du jeu, est graphiquement en dessous de C&C3, possède une campagne très courte à la difficulté mal dosée, a mis en place une mécanique pénalisant grandement les nouveaux joueurs, surtout en multi et y compris contre l'IA, a détruit le charisme de Kane, tente d'introduire des mécaniques intelligentes mais mal exploitées, n'a qu'un seul acteur jouant correctement lors des cinématiques (spoiler : Kane, et encore, pas tout le temps), plante régulièrement, possède l'un des pathfinding les plus horribles des STR (même PA est au dessus), ne possède quasiment pas d'IA sur ses unités, dont la moitié ne servent pas et bordel, quelle fin de merde ! Même Mass Effect 3 fait mieux.
Bref, ne l'achetez pas, ne pensez même pas à acheter, évitez-le, si vous avez l'occasion d'y jouer, jouez à autre chose, vous gagnerez du temps, sauf si vous voulez vous forger votre propre opinion et que vous avez un côté masochiste.
column9: It doesn't use almost any of the mechanics specific to a C&C, has a very low unit limit to hide the game's technical flaws, is graphically inferior to C&C3, has a very short campaign with poorly balanced difficulty, has implemented a mechanic that greatly penalizes new players, especially in multiplayer and even against the AI, has destroyed Kane's charisma, tries to introduce clever but poorly used mechanics, has only one actor who plays correctly during cutscenes (spoiler: Kane, and even then, not all the time), crashes regularly, has one of the most horrible pathfinding in RTS (even PA is above), has almost no AI on its units, half of which are useless and damn, what a shitty ending! Even Mass Effect 3 does better. In short, don't buy it, don't even think about buying it, avoid it, if you have the opportunity to play it, play something else, you'll save time, unless you want to form your own opinion and you have a masochistic side.

column8:
Tiberian Twilight was terrible in 2010 and it's still terrible in 2020.

First off, you have to create an EA account to do anything. Then once you've made an account, you have to copy the CD key steam gives you, log into EA's website, enter the CD key, THEN log into the game launcher at which point you have to accept the EULA before the game starts. On top of that, you need a constant internet connection due to the game's awful DRM. What a mess.

The game itself somehow looks worse than its predecessors. The units have a strange simplistic blocky look to them and I can't say the UI is much better. Everything just feels off and oversimplified in comparison to the earlier games like Tiberium Wars and Kane's Wrath. What a mess.

Meanwhile the gameplay is somewhere between mediocre and infuriating. Unlike the previous Command and Conquer games, for some inexplicable reason, EA decided that it would be a good idea to forgo base building in a franchise known entirely for it's base building. Gone are the days of building multiple factories, upgrade buildings, and tiberium refineries. Instead you get a mobile crawler than can unpack into a factory and build a handful of units and maybe a turret or two. No longer do you need to worry about guarding your crystal-filled harvesters from the enemy. Instead you just play capture-the-crystal with a couple units and sit on a capture point with your crawler. What a mess.

God, I hate this game. I really do. I can't believe I bought it in 2010 - on a physical disc too. The only reason why I own it now is because it came in a bundle.

Oh yeah, and the game is locked to 30fps.

What a ♥♥♥♥ing mess.

column8:
本想为情怀补票，系列打折就全买了。喜欢即时战略的玩家，再差能差到什么程度去？我还没玩过难玩的RTS类！    

体验过后：真是一坨屎。
首先要注册账号，好吧这年代基本操作。
账号注册后开玩，序列号输入，正版游戏嘛~ STEAM都帮我一键复制了。复制确定后~  一般性错误~？？？
可能是我哪里搞错了重来~要重新输入账号密码！也就是每次进游戏都要输入账号密码！序列号怎么都不对，百度后原来序列号要去网上兑换~
这都不算什么。进游戏打单机竟然需要全程联网。经常掉线，打到掉线过关了还不算，还不能进入下一关甚至是当前奖励也没有。只能在某个自动记录的点继续。于是就必须重新输入账号密码，确认玩游戏的名字进入游戏。等于打单机还回档。。。
最致命的还是游戏内容了。不是即时战略的收集资源发展造兵了。而是给你一个指挥中心要什么兵直接按。什么科技发展。就是指挥中心研究一下。反正没有钱的概念，反正你除了指挥中心就是50人口的兵。每个兵人口还不是1。根本早不了多少兵。战术？兵不要钱我就多造点没有战损这一说。50坦克换对方一兵也不亏嘛。这是在玩什么？操作手感也差得不行。除了特效，氛围玩法都不如2.补票？钱也没进WW公司算了吧。
column9:
I wanted to buy the entire series for nostalgia, so I bought it all while it was on sale. For a real-time strategy fan, how bad could it get? I've never played a difficult RTS!

After trying it out: It's a complete mess.
First, you have to register an account, which is pretty basic these days.
After registering, I started playing and entered my serial number. Since it's a legitimate game, Steam copied it for me with one click. After the copy was confirmed, I got a general error? ???
Maybe I made a mistake and have to re-enter my account and password! This means I have to enter my account and password every time I enter the game! The serial number is always wrong. After searching on Baidu, I realized it requires redemption online.
That's not even a big deal. Playing single-player requires a full internet connection. I frequently disconnect, and even if I complete a level, I still can't progress to the next level, and I don't even get the current reward. I can only continue at a certain automatically recorded point. So I have to re-enter my account and password and confirm my game name to enter the game. It's like playing single-player and then rewinding. The most devastating thing is the gameplay. It's not a real-time strategy game where you gather resources, develop, and build troops. Instead, you have a command center where you click on any soldier you want. Technology development is just research in the command center. There's no money involved. Besides the command center, you have 50 soldiers. Each soldier has less than 1 population. You can't have many soldiers at all. Tactics? Soldiers don't cost money, so I just build more. There's no such thing as casualties. 50 tanks in exchange for one enemy soldier isn't a loss. What's the point of this? The controls are terrible. Aside from the special effects, the atmosphere and gameplay aren't as good as in 2. Want to buy more? I didn't even pay for it, so I'll just forget about it.

column8:
Bei mir hat das Spielt zuerst nicht funktioniert und der Code wurde nicht angenommen. 

Wenn das bei euch auch ist dann macht folgendes:

1. Ladet euch den EA Launcher Origin runter
2. Meldet euch mit eurem Konto an oder registriert euch
3. Geht auf Spiele - Spiele hinzufügen
4. Den Steam-Code dort einfügen(mit Strichen)
4. Dann möchte der Origin Launcher das Spiel herunterladen,ihr habt es ja per Steam heruntergeladen, dass müsst ihr dann nicht mehr machen. 
5. Spiel starten und mit den Daten einloggen und einen Namen hinzufügen
6. Spiel startet

Funktioniert übrigens auch bei Red Alert 3 

Hoffe es funktioniert so bei euch und falls das schon irgendwo steht oder es schon jemand geschrieben hat, dann habt ihr es hier nochmal :) 

Viel Spaß beim spielen :D
column9:
The game didn't work for me at first, and the code wasn't accepted.

If this is the case for you, do the following:

1. Download the EA Launcher Origin
2. Log in to your account or register
3. Go to Games - Add Games
4. Paste the Steam code (with dashes)
4. The Origin Launcher will then ask you to download the game. You downloaded it via Steam, so you don't have to do that again.
5. Start the game, log in with your credentials, and add a name
6. The game will start

This also works for Red Alert 3, by the way.

I hope it works for you, and if it's already mentioned somewhere or someone has already posted it, you can find it here again :)

Have fun playing :D

column9:
Unfortunately, I have to give this game a bad rating, despite it being a C&C game.
The plot is brilliant and I loved it. The gameplay mechanics are uglier than Diego Maradona in his underwear. Too few units, no economic system, combat is as tough as Diego Maradona visiting the Pink House, but above all, the online system is forgotten...

A shame for a series that gave us more joy than Diego Maradona.

PS: Starting the game can cause serious problems because the launcher malfunctions when creating an account.

column8:
I loved Command and Conquer 3 + Kanes Wrath. I loved Command and Conquer Generals. I loved Red Alert 2 and 3. 

It's why it hurts me so much to say I absolutely hate this game. I hate what this game represents, it was an attempt to try something new by EA, it failed and then the shareholders a EA screamed and said "IT DIDNT MAKE MONEY DONT DO IT AGAIN".  And then we never got another Command and Conquer game...
The failure of this game permanently damaged and scarred command and conquer series.
The cutscenes are awful, not cheesy like the previous games but solid cringe, i struggled to sit through them. The female "wife" character is incredibly painful to bear witness too. And the gameplay....o boy. Removing base building from a command and conquer game?  REALLY EA? REALLY?

Vote with your wallet. Do not purchase this game. Go and buy Command and Conquer 3 or Kanes Wrath instead. You will have an amazingly better time.

Don't be fooled by all the reviews saying the product key doesn't work. You simply need to register the key through the EA website instead of the game client. And you can easily get the key by right clicking the game in your library, going to MANAGE, and then CD KEYS. The following link is to redeem it.

https://myaccount.ea.com/cp-ui/redemption/index

Game works fine. Quality of the game is a different story entirely, or lack there of. Not recommended for die hard C&C players.

column8:
Well I thought I'd try this game out even though I'd basically written it off as soon as I saw the gameplay and graphics in the run up to its release, plus just about every review is so negative.

In summary, its trash, this is a complete waste of time and money and should be written off, cemented into a wall somewhere and forgotten about.

You have to have an internet connection and EA account to even play the single player mode, simply annoying and I do have an account.

The graphics are laughable, when ever you highlight a unit it gives it a big green border so all the edge details are completely hidden, who's bright idea was that one :-)

The game play is just not C&C anymore either, which is the probably the worst part, no resource gathering or other nice RTS type features, just a quick command points based shoot up.

Even bigger disappointment is that they have taken on-board some of the cool mods out there for tib wars, integrated them and completely ruined them in the process, great job guys, great job!

column8:
First off: you can get the game to work, the solution is by going to EA.com and register the key you get from steam. 

But why bother? This game is an unmitigated disaster even if you don't compare it with the previous titles. 
It's boring, slow and the new mechanics don't work. Even the music is terrible. The story is a travesty and it shows that they weren't bothered to invest in stuff like costumes and sets. The final chapter of the Tiberian saga makes the ending of Mass effect look like Citizen Kane (no pun intended). 

This was a very cynical move by EA to release this as a full C&C title while its obvious that it was designed as a moba-esque online only version which was shoehorned to be a sequel. 

I feel sorry for Joe Kuckan (actor of Kane) that this is his final contribution. He deserved better. 

The Tiberium fps that looked very promising (especially lore wise)  was canceled because EA told us that it didn't meet their "quality standards"  Then they had the nerve to release this garbage?! What a joke.

column8:
Este C&C Tiberian es de lo peor, practicamente mando a la basura la magia de un C&C y creo algo que es una porqueria. Los puntos buenos se quedan opacados por estos graves errores.
Pros:
- Graficos "geniales"
- Unidades de anteriores sagas.
- wow eso es todo.

Contras:
- Estilo de juego que olvida todo lo que es un C&C.
- Una historia que es muy "ligera" nada que ver con las otras de C&C
- La necesidad de elegir un solo estilo de juego (tal vez para una partida multijugador esta bien pero C&C se caracterizaba de que podias creear tu base, defender la y atacar. En este toma todo y lo envia a la basura.)
column9:
This Tiberian C&C is the worst. It practically trashed the magic of a C&C and created something that's rubbish. The good points are overshadowed by these serious flaws.
Pros:
- "Great" graphics
- Units from previous series.
- Wow, that's it.

Cons:
- A gameplay style that forgets everything that a C&C is.
- A story that's very "light," nothing like other C&C games.
- The need to choose a single play style (maybe it's fine for a multiplayer game, but C&C was characterized by the fact that you could create your base, defend it, and attack. This one takes everything and throws it in the trash.)
